org.nettosphere.samples.chat
Class ResourceChat

java.lang.Object
  org.nettosphere.samples.chat.ResourceChat

public class ResourceChat
extends Object

Simple chat resource demonstrating the power of Atmosphere. This resource supports transport like WebSocket, Streaming, JSONP and Long-Polling.

Author:
Jeanfrancois Arcand

broadcast

public Response broadcast(Message message)
Broadcast the received message object to all suspended response. Do not write back the message to the calling connection.

Parameters:
message - a Message
Returns:
a Response
